name: Evergreen Homecare Service of Ny INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Evergreen Homecare Service of Ny INC is a Home Health provider based in Flushing, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $112.7M in Medicaid payments across 742K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $112.7M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,087 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
